greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Remainder when the sum of the first n primes is divided by n.
comment: a(n) = 0 if and only if n is a term of A045345. - _Nicholas Drozd_, Nov 18 2018
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A007504(n) mod n. - _Karl-Heinz Hofmann_, May 05 2021
maple: N:= 1000; # to get the first N terms
seq(C[n] mod n, n = 1 .. N); # _Robert Israel_, May 29 2014
xref: Cf. A007504 (sum of first n primes), A045345 (indices of 0's).
results.author: _Joseph L. Pe_, Jan 31 2004
